// Add callback support to promise
var toCb = function toCb(fn) {
  return function (cb) {
    try {
      var val = fn(cb);
      if (!cb) return val;else if (val && typeof val.then === 'function') {
        return val.then(function (val) {
          return cb(null, val);
        }).catch(cb);
      }
      cb(null, val);
    } catch (err) {
      cb(err);
    }
  };
};
